projects.name: MeowScript
projects.desc: I am a certified cat lover. So with all my love for meow meow I made this Programming language using Moo.js and Javascript Lexer

projects.name: Silent Speak
projects.desc: This project was made by me and team to help hearing impaired people who use sign language to communicate with a person not knowing sign laguage using AI and ML

projects.name: Great Prompts
projects.desc: A Next.js Beauty where you can login using NEXT-AUTH-2.0 and post your Greatly Engineered AI prompts to help fellow users of Great Prompts.

projects.name: BookEReview
projects.desc: An online platform where you can login and post reviews of books you have read, to help others get a review of the great books you have been into.
